tool_description: API to compare or match two addresses
name: Address Compare
title: Address Compare

api_list.name: Address Compare Api
api_list.description:
API to compare or match two addresses. This API is useful for KYC or Risk Assessment Purpose
This is a basic endpoint with latencies.
For premium plans, reach out https://akgnitd.github.io/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://address-compare.p.rapidapi.com/default/entity-scape"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-compare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://address-compare.p.rapidapi.com/default/entity-scape"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-compare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
